name: Fear the Necromancer
description:
The harvest was even worse this year. We thought by praying to the old gods... maybe, just maybe we could make it one more winter. But we did not receive the bountiful fields we asked for. 

No, what we received was nothing like we expected. There will be a harvest this year, no doubt. But the fields are the homes of men.

Murdalize the idiot cultist villagers as a vengeful necromancer!
